description.@en: Chief among my skills is the ability to blend in with my surroundings and stick to the shadows.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: When you fail a Skulduggery or Stealth Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result but must accept the outcome. In addition, you always succeed at Skill Tests to disable locks.
